# availableChapterLocales

**Instance Property**

The locales of the asset’s chapter metadata.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableChapterLocales: [Locale] { get }
```

## Accessing chapter metadata

- **chapterMetadataGroups(bestMatchingPreferredLanguages:)**: Returns an array of chapters with a locale that best matches the list of preferred languages.
- **chapterMetadataGroups(withTitleLocale:containingItemsWithCommonKeys:)**: Returns an array of chapters that contain the specified title locale and common keys.

items.description: Returns an array of chapters with a locale that best matches the list of preferred languages.
items.name: chapterMetadataGroups(bestMatchingPreferredLanguages:)

items.description: Returns an array of chapters that contain the specified title locale and common keys.
items.name: chapterMetadataGroups(withTitleLocale:containingItemsWithCommonKeys:)
